code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:72 year old f retired presents with 2 weeks history of Neurological. she drinks at least 4 beers a day she does not smoke o:Height 154 cm, Weight 81.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 16 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to neurology.

content2.Unmatched: beers a day she does not smoke

td.content: s:a 72 yr old female retired presents with Neurological for 4 weeks. consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily she does not smoke o:Height 153 cm, Weight 78.2 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered B burgdorferi IgM CSF.

s:a white f aged 73 yrs presents with Neurological x 2 weeks. o:Height 154 cm, Weight 81.2 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, B burgdorferi IgG Serum positive a:Paralysis p:administered Immune globulin - 400 mg/kg IV daily x 5 days, performed B burgdorferi IgG Serum, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
